Summary: Missle like object leaving long trail
divs: sighting detailsat approximately 10:45 pm i had just left my home heading out to pickup my son from a church event. as i was driving i looked out my side window, looking towards the east. i saw what looked to be a bright missle like object streak up and towards the west. i hit the breaks on the car and watched. the missle like object was leaving a bright trail (orange\gold in color). the trail was long, from the point that i first saw it, just above the horizon, and followed the object until it disappeared. this lasted approximately 4 seconds. when the objet disappeared immediately so did the trail. it traveled in a straight line going upwards in a slight angle heading west. my first thought was that this was a missle, since i had seen similar when i was in the military, but the trail on this was nothing i have ever seen from any missle being fired. also there was no sound associated with this object. if a missle, i should have heard a rapport. the object looked like it came from the ground but i cannot be sure of that. due to the size of the trail (about 1\4" wide from my viewing point, it seemed to be fairly close.
